name: Bee King
description:
Bee King was part of a German 45 hour Game Jam. Held in 16th -18th October 2020.

The topic was bees with 3 Challenges to implement.

1.) build in an "Easter Egg" - not enough time
2.) Show how important bees are
3.) It has to be connected to "Mecklemburg Vorpommern"

This game was made with Unity. Enjoy.

Team:
2D Artist - Schoenberger: https://www.instagram.com/der.detail.spezialist/
Unity Developer - OctoMan: https://www.udemy.com/user/octoman/
